patthana8.49:4.1: Nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.49:4.2: Nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.49:4.3: Nokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso ca nanokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. #3
patthana8.49:5.1: Nanokilesaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.49:6.1: Nokilesañca nanokilesañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.49:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate nava.
